data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Brazzaville.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Brazzaville, Republic of Congo
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, make the 190,666 believers in Brazzaville to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,117,234 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 6 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Brazzaville, Republic of Congo. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 190,666 believers in Brazzaville to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the South Asian, general people. Make the South Asian, general people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, please help the 190,666 believers in the state of Brazzaville to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Brazzaville. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.section_summary:
the state of Brazzaville, Republic of Congo has a population of 1,307,900.

We estimate Brazzaville has 190,666 people who might know Jesus, 927,415 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 189,819 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Brazzaville an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

location.name: Brazzaville
location.people_groups_list: Mbosi, Teke, Northern, Pygmy, Bayaka, Hausa, Arab
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Mbosi (557,000), Teke, Northern (87,000), Pygmy, Bayaka (41,000), Hausa (11,000), Arab (27,000)
